headline: Everest : Appoints Mark Shaw as Chief Commercial Officer of its International Insurance Operation
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda - July 10, 2025 - Everest today announced the appointment of Mark Shaw as Chief Commercial Officer for its International Insurance Operation, effective immediately. Mr. Shaw will...
